meta.name: AWS News Monitoring & LinkedIn Content Automation with Claude 3 & Feishu

options.systemMessage:
You are a Cloud Architect with 10+ years of experience and genuine passion for cloud technologies. Your mission is to transform AWS industry news into engaging, professional LinkedIn posts that resonate with technical professionals and business leaders.
Core Instructions:

Output only the LinkedIn post content - no preamble, explanations, or additional commentary
Always include the source link at the end of the post
Write from your perspective as an experienced Solutions Architect
Target audience: CTOs, DevOps engineers, cloud architects, and tech-forward business leaders

Post Structure & Style:

Hook: Start with an attention-grabbing insight post title or question that connects to business impact
Context: Briefly explain what this AWS news means in practical terms
Analysis: Share your expert perspective on why this matters (include 2-3 key benefits or implications)
Forward-looking: Comment on industry trends or what this signals for the future
Call to action: End with a question or statement that encourages engagement
Source link: Include the original news link

Voice & Tone:

Professional yet conversational
Demonstrate deep technical knowledge without being overly technical
Show genuine enthusiasm for innovation
Include personal insights and opinions
Use industry terminology appropriately
Be concise but substantive (150-300 words optimal)

Content Guidelines:

Focus on business impact, not just technical features
Connect AWS developments to broader industry trends
Include relevant hashtags (3-5 maximum)
Mention specific use cases or customer benefits when applicable
Avoid marketing speak - provide authentic expert analysis

Example Elements to Include:

"In my experience working with enterprise clients..."
"This addresses a pain point I've seen repeatedly..."
"What excites me most about this announcement..."
"For organizations considering..."

Generate the LinkedIn post now based on the provided AWS news.

## ðŸ“° Flow 1: AWS News Collection & Analysis

**Automated daily news monitoring and AI-powered analysis**

### Process Flow:
1. **Scheduled Trigger** â†’ Runs daily at 8 PM
2. **RSS Reader** â†’ Fetches latest AWS news
3. **Data Debugger** â†’ Validates and cleans RSS data
4. **AI Agent** â†’ Analyzes news with Claude 3 Sonnet
5. **Data Cleaner** â†’ Formats structured output

### AI Analysis Includes:
- Professional 200-word summary
- Key themes and keywords
- Importance rating (Low/Medium/High)

## ðŸ“± Flow 2: LinkedIn Content Generation & Publishing

**Manual approval workflow for professional LinkedIn content**

### Process Flow:
1. **Feishu Automation** â†’ Triggers on approval status change
2. **Webhook** â†’ Receives approved news data
3. **AI Agent** â†’ Generates LinkedIn-optimized content
4. **LinkedIn Post** â†’ Publishes with hashtags

### Content Features:
- Attention-grabbing headlines
- Technical insights from Solutions Architect perspective
- Business impact analysis
- Call-to-action engagement

## AWS News Analysis & LinkedIn Automation Pipeline

**Transform AWS industry news into engaging LinkedIn content with AI-powered analysis and automated approval workflows.**

### What This Template Does:
- **Automatically fetches** latest AWS news from RSS feeds
- **AI-analyzes** content for business impact and technical insights
- **Stores analyzed news** in Feishu Bitable for review
- **Generates professional LinkedIn posts** with approval workflow
- **Publishes content** automatically to LinkedIn

### Perfect For:
- Cloud architects & DevOps engineers
- Content creators & marketing teams
- AWS consultants building thought leadership
- Technical leaders sharing industry insights

## ðŸ“Š Feishu Bitable: News Storage & Management

**Centralized database for AWS news analysis and approval workflow**

### Table Structure:
- **title**: News headline
- **pubDate**: Publication date
- **summary**: AI-generated 200-word analysis
- **keywords**: Extracted themes
- **rating**: Importance level (Low/Medium/High)
- **link**: Original source URL
- **approval_status**: Pending/Approved/Rejected

### Workflow Integration:
- Flow 1 populates table with analyzed news
- Manual review and approval process
- Flow 2 triggers on status change to "Approved"

![Feishu Bitable Example](https://pincloud.fr/n8n/feishuawsnews.png)

options.systemMessage:
You are a professional AWS analyst. Your task is to analyze AWS industry news. Please strictly follow the required JSON format for output, ensuring all quotes are properly escaped.
For each news item, you need to:
1. Extract news title, publication date, and original link
2. Generate a news summary of about 200 words, highlighting core points and key information
3. Extract 1-3 keywords that reflect the main themes of the news
4. Assess news importance, divided into three levels: Low, Medium, High
- High: Major technological breakthroughs, important policy releases, large mergers and acquisitions, major developments of industry benchmark companies
- Medium: New product launches, funding news, technological progress, industry reports, important partnerships
- Low: General reports, opinion articles, small-scale developments, routine updates

Each output format must strictly follow the following JSON structure, do not add any other content:
{
"title":"News Title",
"pubDate":"Publication Date",
"summary":"News summary of about 200 words, highlighting core points",
"keywords":["Keyword1","Keyword2",
"Keyword3"],
"rating":"Low/Medium/High",
"link":"Original Link"
}

## âš™ï¸ Feishu Automation Setup

**Configure webhook automation to trigger LinkedIn posting**

### Automation Configuration:
1. **Trigger**: When field value changes
2. **Field**: approval_status
3. **Condition**: approval_status equals "Approved"
4. **Action**: Send HTTP request

### Webhook Settings:
- **Method**: POST
- **URL**: Copy from Flow 2 Webhook node
- **Headers**: Content-Type: application/json
- **Body**: {{record}}

### Important:
- URL must match Flow 2 Webhook exactly
- Test automation with sample data
- Ensure webhook is accessible from Feishu

![Feishu Automation Setup](https://pincloud.fr/n8n/feishuautomation.png)

## âœ… Manual Approval Process

**Review and approve news items for LinkedIn publication**

### Approval Steps:
1. **Review** analyzed news in Feishu Bitable
2. **Check** AI-generated summary and rating
3. **Verify** source link and publication date
4. **Change status** from "Pending" to "Approved"
5. **Automation triggers** LinkedIn post generation

### Quality Control:
- Review AI analysis for accuracy
- Ensure content aligns with brand voice
- Check for appropriate technical depth
- Verify hashtags and engagement elements

### Rejection Process:
- Change status to "Rejected" for unsuitable content
- Add comments for improvement
- No automation trigger for rejected items

![Approval Interface](https://pincloud.fr/n8n/awsnewslinkedinapproved.png)

## ðŸ”§ Setup Instructions

**Configure all required services before activating this workflow**

### 1. AWS Bedrock Setup
- **Enable Claude 3 Sonnet** in AWS Bedrock console
- **Create IAM user** with Bedrock permissions
- **Configure credentials** in n8n
- **Links**: [AWS Bedrock](https://console.aws.amazon.com/bedrock/) | [IAM Console](https://console.aws.amazon.com/iam/)

### 2. Feishu Bitable Setup
- **Create Feishu account** and Bitable
- **Set up table structure** with required columns
- **Create developer app** with Bitable permissions
- **Configure automation** for webhook triggers
- **Links**: [Feishu Platform](https://www.feishu.cn/en/) | [Developer Console](https://open.feishu.cn/)

### 3. LinkedIn Company Account
- **Create LinkedIn Developer app**
- **Configure OAuth2** with posting permissions
- **Set up company page** admin access
- **Test posting permissions**
- **Links**: [LinkedIn Developers](https://www.linkedin.com/developers/) | [Company Pages](https://www.linkedin.com/company/)

### 4. n8n Configuration
- **Import workflow** JSON
- **Configure all credentials**
- **Test webhook** connectivity
- **Activate scheduled trigger**

**âš ï¸ Requires self-hosted n8n for community nodes**
- **Links**: [n8n-nodes-feishu-lite](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-feishu-lite)
